fullplot: Chief detective Carl Mèrck and his assistant Assad become involved in a five-year-old case concerning the mystery of politician Merete Lynggaard's disappearance - a journey that takes them deep into the undercurrent of abuse and malice that lurks beneath the polished surface of Scandinavia.
plot: Police inspector Carl Mèrck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman.
title: The Keeper of Lost Causes
